channel.title: Entertainment
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from Entertainment, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Brooks Nader Dissolves Her Lip Filler and Jokes It's a 'Christmas Present' to Her Parents
item.description: The model has been open about her past enhancements from her use of Botox to her nose job

item.title: Emma Roberts and Lookalike Son Rhodes, 4, Smile for a Sweet Selfie as They Enjoy a 'Merry Merry' Snow Day
item.description: The actress welcomed Rhodes on Dec. 27, 2020 with ex Garrett Hedlund

item.title: Meghan King Comments on ‘Tough Year’ After Losing Custody of Her 3 Kids to Ex Jim Edmonds
item.description: King and Edmonds share three children: daughter Aspen, 9, and twin boys Hart and Hayes, 7

item.title: Kate Middleton and Princess Charlotte Play a Surprise ‘Special Duet’ at Her Annual Christmas Carol Service
item.description: The Princess of Wales hosted her fifth "Together at Christmas" carol service at Westminster Abbey in London on Dec. 5

item.title: Former “The Lion King” Child Actress Imani Dia Smith Dies at 25, Boyfriend Charged with Murder
item.description: A GoFundMe page set up in Imani Dia Smith's name has already raised more than $46,000 in funds for her family

item.title: FBI Uncovers More Than One Million Additional Epstein Docs
item.description: There's even more Epstein documents coming -- more than a million in fact ... that's according to a post Wednesday from the U.S. Department of Justice...

item.title: TikToker Tea Tyme Arrested for Allegedly Killing Pedestrian During Livestream
item.description: LWD -- livestreaming while driving -- is why TikToker Tea Tyme is behind bars on Christmas Eve ... nearly 2 months after she allegedly ran over a pede...

item.title: Cat Lady Slams Alaska Airlines After 2 Pets, 1 Carry-On Debacle
item.description: Alaska Airlines doesn't give in to purr-pressure -- that's what Alexandra Compton found out on a recent flight home for the holidays ... and she told ...

item.title: Sebastian Telfair Spills on What It Was Like Being Locked Up with Diddy
item.description: In his first interview since being released from the same prison that houses Diddy, former NBA player Sebastian Telfair tells TMZ what it was like bei...

item.title: Diddy Files New Appeal, Says Judge Acted as 'Thirteenth Juror' with Harsh Sentence
item.description: Diddy's legal team is ripping Judge Arun Subramanian, accusing him of crossing a line with the 50-month sentence ... and acting more like a juror than...
